extension.news: - Switched to new TVdb scraper and meta data caching system.[CR] - User experience greatly improved after TVdb data is cached locally.[CR] - More meta data info is displayed.[CR] - Manually update cached data directly from TVdb from context menu.[CR] - Actors and their images are now displayed, when using Kodi 17.x or higher.[CR] - Added banner image support.[CR] - Total space used for cache now displayed in "Clear Cache".[CR]
